Package jrobots.simulation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Simulation  
    SimulationController
    At this present state, the SimulationController is determined to be the entity which initiates the simulation flow.
    SimulationRun
    A SimulationRun is basically a sequence of SimulationStates, but should rather be seen as a database with routines for manipulation.
    SimulationState
    Contains one simulation state.
